comments.body:
Server doesn't set the `apiVersion` field for this `unversioned.APIGroup` object at the endpoint /apis/extensions, so per @bgrant0607's comment, we shouldn't include the `apiversion` field in the swagger. But the same `unversioned.APIGroup` object is also in api/swagger-spec/batch.json and api/swagger-spec/autoscaling.json, where the `apiVersion` field should be included.
My suggestion is we expose the `apiVersion` field at all places to avoid confusion.
